title: 820-3330 pressing power button power on then off
message: Hi I have a board that I change ISL On and I hit the power button it turns on then off I hit it again and it turns on no issue but it does this every time I power it up.

title: 820-3330 pressing power button power on then off
message:
Does the board turn on by itslef when you connect the charger?
Remove the battery for this test.
Be sure to use 85W charger.

title: 820-3330 pressing power button power on then off
message: Yes it turn on by itself with out battery I have a original charger that is my test charger verified in system profiler. It’s weird because a PRAM solves it but when I remove the battery for a few days it resumes the same symptoms
